post.author: 이상훈
post.content:
TorontoFlex.org User Group에서 이벤트를 개최한다고 하네요.

special Toronto Flex User Group event

On Wednesday January 16th, 2008
7pm to 9pm
- Adobe pre-release tour for Flex 3 (Mike Potter.)

The location of the meeting
Rhino Bar & Grill, 1249 Queen Street West, Toronto.
이곳이 어떤 곳인지는 모르겠지만, 좋을 것 같은 느낌.

Note that this venue can hold 90 people, so if you intend on going, please register early.
선착순 90명이랍니다. 빨리 등록하세요.

In another bit of news: we'll be holding another Toronto Flex Camp on May 15th, 2008! Bigger venue, more speakers and more food;) Details to follow in the new year.
post.title: Flex event
